# Python cache files
__pycache__/
*.py[cod]
*.pyo

# Virtual environment folders
venv/
env/
.venv/
ENV/

# IDE/editor settings
.vscode/
.idea/

# OS generated files
.DS_Store
Thumbs.db

# Logs and text files
*.log
*.txt

# Databases
*.sqlite3
*.db

# Django specific
/media/
staticfiles/
*.pot
*.mo

# Environment variables
.env
*.env

# Migrations (optional, keep if you want history)
*/migrations/__pycache__/
*/migrations/*.py
*/migrations/*.pyc

# Build and distribution
*.so
*.egg
*.egg-info/
dist/
build/
